other_title: 完全勝利ダイテイオー (Japanese)
plot: A strange invasionary force is headed to Earth and Eldoran fails to protect a city from the attack using Raijin-Oh, Ganbaruger and Gosaurer, turning them into a gigantic sword that crashes to a elementary school. Now, a new list of kids were chosen to stop the alien force using the new robot Daiteioh and stop them from taking over Earth.
